EmailTemplate.name: Request for 501C3 canned response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI Coolers. I have reviewed your documents and they look great. We are just missing a copy of the original IRS 501C3 letter that designates the organization a nonprofit, or in some cases your state tax exemption documents. I have attached a sample of the IRS letter so you can see what to look for. You can reply to this email with your document.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Outfitters
512.394.9384
customerservice@yeti.com
